description:
Today, I have called you all to my house for one reason: To show you pictures of Marui Mitsuba. H-Hey!  What`s your problem, Mitsuba?!  N-No, it`s not like that! Look at your locker!  If I increase the contrast…See?  It`s a face!  It`s a ghost, photo evidence of a ghost! Huh?  Her stuff just looks like a ghost, eh? Then look at this!  That same face shows up in EVERY shot I have of her! Mwahaha…Scared now?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ビューティフル トラウマー
